name: Institute of global transformation
goal: The Institute of global transformation is a social innovation club working on global transformation. We build open space to philosophize on transformation and to share our wisdom on various topics. This international network is based on swarm intelligence and co-creates in many different ways. Our mission of our journeys is to share our experience, social capital, materials and access, to facilitate a better future for us all.
interests: Agriculture, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: Employment, welfare, youth, education, sustainability, smart cities, big data, ICT, space technology, humanity and ethics in technology. Horizon 2020 strategic policy.
